item.title: Chelsea add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "The quality of owning freezes you forever in "I," and cuts you off forever from the "we." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Chelsea add a quote by Wislawa Szymborska
item.description: "I'm old-fashioned and think that reading books is the most glorious pastime that humankind has yet devised." -- Wislawa Szymborska

item.title: Chelsea add a quote by Sigrid Undset
item.description: "And when we give each other Christmas gifts in His name, let us remember that He has given us the sun and the moon and the stars, and the earth with its forests and mountains and oceans--and all that lives and move upon them. He has given us all green things and everything that blossoms and bears fruit and all that we quarrel about and all that we have misused--and to save us from our foolishness, from all our sins, He came down to earth and gave us Himself." -- Sigrid Undset

item.title: Chelsea add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa
